attributes.name: Air mattress features
attributes.description: Describes unique characteristics of an air mattress, like easy to inflate or puncture resistant

attributes.description: Specifies included archery accessories, e.g. stabilizer mount, safety glass arrows

attributes.name: Assisted braking technology
